aboutIntro.title: We Add Flavor to Your Table with Traditional Recipes
aboutIntro.subtitle: SarMez is a local flavor workshop that prepares regional recipes with modern production standards. Delivered safely to restaurants, markets, and homes.

card1.title: Journey of Flavor
card1.text: Born from the abundance of the Aegean, SarMez combines homemade recipes with modern production. With our principles of hygiene, quality, and food safety, we invite you to a flavor journey from sarma to meze, from çiğ köfte to much more.

card2.title: Production with Women's Power
card2.text: At SarMez, the heart of our production is women's labor. With our team, 70% of whom are women, we bring flavor together with dedication and care.

sarma.heading: Stuffed Vine Leaves
sarma.body: Stuffed vine leaves are a gem of Turkish cuisine and a symbol of craftsmanship. Delicately prepared thin vine leaves meet a delicious filling to create a magnificent feast of flavors. Our stuffed vine leaves, uniquely produced in our own facility with serial production in Turkey, bring flavor and aesthetics together. With our carefully prepared traditional recipes, we invite you to a delicious Aegean journey.

cigkofte.heading: Çiğ Köfte
cigkofte.body: Çiğ köfte is one of the unique tastes of Turkish cuisine. We are proud to present this unique flavor in its purest and most natural form. Produced entirely with natural and organic ingredients, our çiğ köfte prioritizes your health and taste. When it comes to hygiene and freshness, SarMez comes to mind. With our traditional recipes carefully inspected by our food engineers, our çiğ köfte awaits everyone in search of flavor.

sustainability.title: SUSTAINABILITY
sustainability.subtitle: The Future of Flavor and Naturalness

intro.title: From Nature to Your Table, Without Leaving a Trace
intro.body: At SarMez, we take great care to ensure the naturalness and freshness of every ingredient we use in our kitchen. From our raw meatballs to our stuffed vine leaves, from our kalburabastı dessert to our mezes, all our products are prepared with ingredients sourced from local producers and free from additives. In this way, we not only preserve the flavor but also reflect our respect for nature in our production process.
